IF(WIN32)
	IF(NOT EXISTS "${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r16b/ndk-build.cmd")
		DKINSTALL(${DKONLINE}/Tools/android-ndk-r16b-windows-x86.zip android-ndk-r16b)
	ENDIF()
	GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(ANDROID_NDK "${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r16b" ABSOLUTE)  #Get the windows short filepath
ENDIF()

IF(MAC)
	IF(NOT EXISTS ${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r16b)
		DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
		DKDOWNLOAD(${DKONLINE}/Tools/android-ndk-r16b-darwin-x86_64.zip)
		DKEXTRACT(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/android-ndk-r16b-darwin-x86_64.zip ${3RDPARTY})
	ENDIF()
ENDIF()

IF(UNIX)
IF(NOT APPLE)
	IF(NOT EXISTS ${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r16b)
		DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
		DKDOWNLOAD(${DKONLINE}/Tools/android-ndk-r16b-linux-x86_64.zip)
		DKEXTRACT(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/android-ndk-r16b-linux-x86_64.zip ${3RDPARTY})
	ENDIF()
ENDIF()
ENDIF()
